name: Ceremonial Disengagement
description: Ritualistic practices to sever emotional, spiritual, and mental bonds with toxic individuals and influences.

cards.title: The Severance Ritual
cards.description: Performing a structured ritual to cut psychic and emotional ties to harmful relationships.
cards.bulletpoints: Cord Cutting Invocation, Energy Release Visualization, Grounding After Severance

cards.title: The Mirror Reflection Technique
cards.description: Using mirrored energy projection to neutralize emotional and psychic attachments.
cards.bulletpoints: Reflective Visualization, Emotional Transmutation, Psychic Shielding Integration

cards.title: Rewriting the Soul Contract
cards.description: Revoking subconscious agreements that keep toxic patterns in place.
cards.bulletpoints: Affirmation-Based Deprogramming, Soul Contract Nullification, Ritual of Rebirth
